javadoc:
A class to handle the space requirements on the status bar that vary for different OSes.  For 
 example, the Mac requires extra space on the status bar, due to the drag icon the Mac uses.
name: StatusBarSpacer
comment:
A class to handle the space requirements on the status bar that vary for different OSes.  For 
 example, the Mac requires extra space on the status bar, due to the drag icon the Mac uses.
